Descriptor.Name: mean information content on the vertex degree magnitude
Descriptor.Description: measures the complexity of the molecule

Descriptor.Name: 2nd component symmetry directional WHIM index / weighted by Sanderson electronegativity
Descriptor.Description: based on the statistical indices calculated as the information content index on the symmetry along each component

Descriptor.Name: number of primary aliphatic amine groups
hydrophilic factor
Descriptor.Description: empirical index related to the hydrophilicities of compounds based on count descriptors. It is a measure of the number of hydrophilic functional groups (-OH, -SH, -NH)
